data: Three teaching staff members from Spean Bridge Primary School will attend the LFEE French Language immersion course in Lyon France in the summer of 2017.  The will gain knowledge, methodology, confidence and resources which will improve and enhance the teaching of French as a second Language within the school and help the staff to meet the Scottish Government Initiative of teaching 1+2 language with in all Primary Schools.  Currently only one member of the teaching staff is a confident French speaker and to meet professional duties and responsibilities the staff require training and experience.  Following the immersion course participants will not only embed French into their daily teaching routine but will share good practise through training, clubs and family event for the community.  The immersion course will also provide opportunities for building cross cultural relationship with other schools and professionals and the chance to be come e-twins with a French primary school enhancing the European and Global Sustainability obligations of the school.
